mapper.insert:
insert into nodejs_storage ( id, storageKey, storageName, storageType, storageSize, modified, url, add_time, deleted ) values
( #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.storageKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.storageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.storageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.storageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.add_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.deleted,jdbcType=BIT} )
